A. Finding time is a preparatory action rather than a relaxation activity.
B. Checking mail is usually not a relaxing activity and can sometimes be stressful.
C. Listening to music is a common way to relax, as it can help reduce stress and promote a sense of calm.
D. Going to bed is a step towards休息 and can be considered a way to relax, but it is more of an action towards ending the day rather than an activity done to relax.
